thread.title: Daily Herald Media athletes of the week
thread.title_full: Daily Herald Media athletes of the week

title: Daily Herald Media athletes of the week
text:
Daily Herald Media athletes of the week Tim Johnson , Daily Herald Media 3:11 p.m. CDT October 7, 2015 Brian Root. 15 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
BRIAN ROOT 
Senior 
Soccer 
The Bluejays veteran had two goals and an assist as Merrill rallied from a two-goal deficit to beat Wausau East 4-2 in a Wisconsin Valley Conference matchup last Thursday in Wausau. It was the second time this season that Root has scored two goals in a conference game as he accomplished it against Marshfield on Sept. 15. The Bluejays travel to Marshfield on Thursday. 
Ben Martin.
